column1: Master of International Business Economics and Management (Brussels)
column5: The Master of Science in International Business Economics and Management instills an international mindset in talented individuals educated in diverse backgrounds, and fosters an attitude of autonomous, critical and informed reflection. It prepares you for a career in international business through the acquisition of economic insights, knowledge and management skills, to bring solutions to concrete problems.Find out more about the course content, starting profile, future prospects, on the programme's websiteVisit the programme websiteÂ
